name: AntithromboticTherapyAntiplatelet
title: Antithrombotic Therapy Antiplatelet
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of medications that are antiplatelet medications used to reduce stroke mortality and morbidity.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a medication that is an antithrombotic medication, including oral, rectal, and injectable dose forms.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent enoxaparin and heparin generally given for VTE prophylaxis.)
